channel.title: MiniMax Releases
channel.description: MiniMax model releases on HuggingFace and new GitHub repositories

item.title: MiniMax-01
item.description: [GitHub Repo] | The official repo of MiniMax-Text-01 and MiniMax-VL-01, large-language-model & vision-language-model based on Linear Attention | Language: Python | Stars: 3352 | Topics: large-language-models, llm, llms, minimax-text-01, minimax-vl-01, vision-language-model, vlm

item.title: audio-tools
item.description: [GitHub Repo] | A collection of optimized utilities for text-to-audio processing, enhancing both training and inference workflows. This repository contains robust implementations adapted from open-source libraries. | Language: Python | Stars: 45

item.title: MiniMax-MCP
item.description: [GitHub Repo] | Official MiniMax Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables interaction with powerful Text to Speech, image generation and video generation APIs. | Language: Python | Stars: 1282 | Topics: image-generation, image-to-video, mcp, mcp-server, mcp-tools, text-to-image, text-to-speech, text-to-video, video-generation, voice-cloning

item.title: MiniMax-MCP-JS
item.description: [GitHub Repo] | Official MiniMax Model Context Protocol (MCP) JavaScript implementation that provides seamless integration with MiniMax's powerful AI capabilities including image generation, video generation, text-to-speech, and voice cloning APIs. | Language: TypeScript | Stars: 104 | Topics: image-generation, mcp, mcp-server, mcp-tools, minimax, text-to-speech, video-generation

item.title: vllm
item.description: [GitHub Repo] | A high-throughput and memory-efficient inference and serving engine for LLMs | Language: Python | Stars: 15

item.title: awesome-minimax-integrations
item.description: [GitHub Repo] | Explore these applications integrating MiniMax's multimodal API to see how text, vision, and speech processing capabilities are incorporated into various software. | Stars: 67
